revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Leopard Imaging |model=LeopardBoard |revision=355 (Ver. 1.4) |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |price=84 |est_release_date=08/2009 |type=development board |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=12 |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TMS320 (DM355);TMS320DM355Z7E; |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=29F2G08AAD |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT47H64M16HR-3:G |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, populated,, J1 |serial=yes,, console port,, stereo plug connector |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Davicom |eth_chip2_model=DM9000BEP |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=3-5.5V Single-Channel RS-232 Line Driver/Receiver;TI;TRS3221E;;1;,,, USB Peripheral Power Management;TI;TPS2141;;1;,,, Low-Power Stereo Audio Codec;TI;TLV320AIC3104;;1;,,, 5-Channel Power Management IC;TI;TPS65053;;1;,,, Single 2-Input Positive AND Gate;TI;SN74LVC1G08;;1; |flags=SD Card slot, Component Video, Audio out (2.5 mm), Audio in (2.5mm), LCD/DVI, Camera 2MP, I2C, UART, GPIO }} {{TagLine|A Beagle Buddy Web Camera}} :[https://beagleboard.org/leopard Product page]
===Links=== *[https://elinux.org/LeopardBoard ''LeopardBoard'' on '''Embedded Linux''' Wiki] *[https://www.planetanalog.com/two-low-cost-boards-from-leopard-imaging-with-ridgerun-software-enable-low-cost-development-of-video-and-vision-applications/ ''Two Low Cost Boards From Leopard Imaging'' on '''Planet Analog''']
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Texas Instruments]] TMS320 (DM355) :ARM926EJ-S + DSP *Storage: 256B SLC NAND Flash, SD card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 128MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Network: 1x FE LAN ports *USB: 1x USB Mini (Host) ports *Power Source: 5V/1A barrel plug
==Images== <gallery> File:LeopardBoard 355 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:LeopardBoard 355 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:LeopardBoard Camera Top.jpeg|Camera Board Top File:LeopardBoard Camera Bottom.jpeg|Camera Board Bottom File:LeopardBoard 355.jpeg|With Camera </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
